meanings.definition: A small pit or depression, especially in the retina of the eye.
meanings.sent1: The foveolas in the retina help us see clearly.
meanings.sent2: The doctor examined the foveolas in the patient's eye.
meanings.sent3: The tiny foveolas in the eye seemed to wink at the curious observer.
meanings.sent4: Her attention to detail was like focusing on the foveolas of a painting.
meanings.sent5: The foveolas in the eye are like tiny windows to the world.
